channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish Dump, 7th September
item.description:
Bed, mattress and other furniture dumped on the pavement on Connington Road, just opposite the Tesco petrol station. At the back of No.5 Columbine Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Conington Road, Ladywell, London

item.title: Vomit in doorway entrance at 195/197 wardour street, 7th September
item.description:
THERE IS A LARGE AMOUNT OF VOMIT IN DOORWAY ENTRANCE TO 195/197 WARDOUR STREET, W1F 8ZG. Someone has vomited in the entrance, so there are piles of sick. Please could someone wash the vomit away? The entrance is used by a large number of workers and residents. Thanks you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 133-135, Oxford Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
